prompt: Is Nikola Jokic the Wayne Gretzky of the NBA? Watching Jokic has made me realize that I never understood basketball well enough, and makes me wonder what else could be solved a different way than we all believe. Was Gretzky that way too? How yes and how no? I didn't watch too much of him at the time.
